content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────
### Iron Plate Smelting Facility at position (5.0, 5.0)
Consists of:
– A furnace located at (5.0, 5.0) used to smelt iron ore with coal into iron plates.

### Copper Plate Production Facility at position (–27.0, –60.0)
Consists of:
– A furnace located at (–27.0, –60.0) used to smelt copper ore into copper plates.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Call Misuse
  – Incorrect usage of get_entities() caused TypeErrors: one instance received an unexpected keyword argument ('radius') while another provided too many positional arguments.
  – Tip: Verify the function signature and use the correct parameter format when calling get_entities().

• Entity Iteration Failure
  – An attempt to iterate over a None value (when retrieving Lab entities) raised a "'NoneType' object is not iterable" error.
  – Tip: Check that entity-retrieval functions return a valid list and apply a fallback (such as converting None to an empty list) before iterating.

• Lab Placement and Crafting Issues
  – Multiple attempts to locate, place, or craft a Lab failed due to either the absence of a Lab in inventory or insufficient resources/sub-ingredients (for example, missing iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables).
  – Tip: Confirm that the Lab is available in inventory before placement and ensure all required sub-ingredients are sufficiently produced (including proper smelting and resource processing) prior to initiating Lab crafting.
